edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.screens

Class LoadingScreen

  • BaseScreen
    • edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.screens.LoadingScreen

  • public class LoadingScreen
extends BaseScreen

    Presents a progress bar while the assets are being loaded for the game, then switches to the MainMenu screen.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoadingScreen(SpaceJourney game)
      Presents a progress bar while the assets are being loaded for the game, then switches to the MainMenu screen.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void render(float delta)
      Constantly updates the screen with new content, but more specifically, this updates the progress bar, and changes screens when everything is loaded.
      void show()
      Method that creates initial load logic.

      • Methods inherited from class edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.screens.BaseScreen

        dispose, getGame, getScreenName, hide, pause, render, resize, resume, show

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoadingScreen

        public LoadingScreen(SpaceJourney game)

        Presents a progress bar while the assets are being loaded for the game, then switches to the MainMenu screen.

    • Method Detail

      • show

        public void show()

        Method that creates initial load logic.

      • render

        public void render(float delta)

        Constantly updates the screen with new content, but more specifically, this updates the progress bar, and changes screens when everything is loaded.

        Parameters:
        delta - The time different between the last and current render() call.
